title: Smart Data Models - QueueMonitor schema
description: An office counter queue system on a daily run. First Version from synchronicity project

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be QueueMonitor.

localId.description: Property. Unique identifier from the source data set.

officeName.description: Property.  name of the service provided at the counter. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'

serviceName.description: Property. Unique identifier from the source data set. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'

serviceId.description: Property. id of the service provided at the counter. The same service could be provided by many offices. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'

serviceStatus.description: Property. status of the service at timestamp time. Enum:'Closed, Open, Suspended'

serviceStatusNote.description: Property. Additional note to the service status. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'

scheduleTime.description: Property. Scheduled working time of the service. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'

queueLine.description: Property. Description about the queue line associated to the service. The same office counter could serve different queue lines with different priority level. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'

linePriority.description: Property. Level of priority of this line at Counter Queue. Model:'https://schema.org/Integer'

lastTicketIssued.description: Property. Last ticket number issued or this line at Counter Queue. Model:'https://schema.org/Integer'

lastTicketIssuedLabel.description: Property. Label associated to the lastTicketIssued. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'

ticketServed.description: Property. Ticket number currently served by this line at Counter Queue. Model:'https://schema.org/Integer'

ticketServedLabel.description: Property. Unique identifier from the source data set. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'

ticketsToServe.description: Property. Unique identifier from the source data set. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'
